title: AOU Schedule Manager
description: An Android app for Arab Open University students to help them track thier courses' lectures, Quizzes, TMAs, MTAs, and Finals

title: SpotifyMuteAds
description: a windows C# script that mutes Spotify when an ad's playing

title: Maze Generator
description: a maze generator using a recursive backtracking algorithm.

title: Conway's Game of Life
description: Implementation of the famous Conway's game of life. It is a cellular automaton, that was invented by Cambridge mathematician John Conway.
